item.title: Does anyone know how to change the rate of npc drop?
item.dc:creator: @k0_gawd_k0 k0 gawd k0
item.description:
@k0_gawd_k0 wrote:

well all my npcs drop there items at 100% drop rates. and well this is what i got for my npcs items. :

i go into NPChandler (for some reason thats where it is.) :

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 100) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1191, npcs[NPCID].absX,
npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID),
false);

                        }

that right there allows a goblin to drop 1 iron kite, but the drop rate is 100% what file do i need to go in to change the drop rate? dont say npcdrops.cfg because i tryed. thanks k0 gawd k0.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how to change the rate of npc drop?
